name: Sunny-Side Up Fried Eggs
description: Perfect fried eggs should have golden, runny yolks and tender, just-set whites. Here's how to nail a simple breakfast of sunny-side up eggs every single time.
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in a cast iron, carbon steel, or nonstick skillet over medium heat until lightly foaming, tilting pan to evenly distribute the melted butter. Carefully break eggs into the skillet, season with salt, and cook until the whites are just set on top and the yolks are still runny, about 3 minutes. Transfer to a plate, season with pepper if desired, and serve immediately.
